alert.note: Alert for Clay (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 10 at 9:00PM CDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Iowa... Little Sioux River above Spencer / Highway 18 affecting Clay County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Little Sioux River above Spencer / Highway 18. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 1322.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM CDT Sunday was 1322.2 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 1322.0 feet. && Fld Observed Location Stg Stg Day/Time Little Sioux River Spencer / Highway 1 1322.0 1322.2 Sun 8 PM &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning around 10 AM CDT.
